      • city.cs.engine.StaticBody

    public class PressurePlate
extends city.cs.engine.StaticBody
implements city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
    Creates a pressure plate.

      • PressurePlate

        public PressurePlate(city.cs.engine.World world,
                     Box box,
                     Gate gate)
        The constructor for the PressurePlate class. Adds the image of the pressure plate. Used when a pressure plate is used to open a gate.
        Parameters:
        world - The current level.
        box - The box in the current level.
        gate - The corresponding gate for the pressure plate.

      • PressurePlate

        public PressurePlate(city.cs.engine.World world,
                     Box box2,
                     boolean noGate)
        The constructor for the PressurePlate class. Adds the image of the pressure plate Used when a pressure plate has no gate to open.
        Parameters:
        world - The current level.
        box2 - The box in the current level.
        noGate - Boolean whether or not there's a gate.

        The constructor for the PressurePlate class. Adds the image of the pressure plate Used to end the game.
        Parameters:
        world - The current level.
        box3 - The box in the current level.
        game - The current game.

    • Method Detail

      • collide

        public void collide(city.cs.engine.CollisionEvent e)
        Checks for collisions with the box at differing levels and with different constructors. Plays a sound clip when colliding with any box. Advances to the next level if the final pressure plate is used.
        Specified by:
        collide in interface city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
        Parameters:
        e -
